silver.name: AFK
silver.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 20 gold.

silver.name: Team Building
silver.desc:
Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 7 player combats.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

silver.name: Band of Thieves I
silver.desc: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

silver.name: Caretaker's Ally
silver.desc: Gain a random 2-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.

silver.name: Lunch Money
silver.desc: Every 8 damage you deal to enemy tacticians gives you 2 gold.

silver.name: Branching Out
silver.desc:
Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

silver.name: Silver Ticket
silver.desc: Gain a free Shop reroll after every 4 rerolls. Gain 3 gold.

silver.name: Partial Ascension
silver.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 30% more damage.

silver.name: Rolling For Days I
silver.desc: Gain 11 free Shop rerolls.

silver.name: Component Buffet
silver.desc:
Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

silver.name: Exiles I
silver.desc: Your units that start combat with no adjacent allies gain a 20% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

silver.name: Spoils of War I
silver.desc: Enemies have a 25% chance to drop loot when killed.

silver.name: Featherweights I
silver.desc: Your Tier 1 and 2 champions gain 15% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

silver.name: Fine Vintage
silver.desc: Completed items left on your bench for 4 rounds transform into Support Anvils.

silver.name: Unified Resistance I
silver.desc: If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 15 Armor and Magic Resist.

silver.name: Good For Something I
silver.desc: Champions that aren't holding items have a 50% to drop 1 gold on death.

silver.name: Help Is On The Way
silver.desc: After 8 player combats, choose 1 of 4 Support items.

silver.name: Iron Assets
silver.desc:
Gain a component anvil and 4 gold.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

silver.name: Item Grab Bag I
silver.desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

silver.name: Keepers I
silver.desc: Combat start: grant units with adjacent allies a 145 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.

silver.name: Lategame Specialist
silver.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 33 gold.

silver.name: Latent Forge
silver.desc:
After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

silver.name: Missed Connections
silver.desc: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.

silver.name: One, Two, Five!
silver.desc: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.

silver.name: Ones Twos Three
silver.desc: Gain 2 1-cost champion, 2 2-cost champions, and 1 3-cost champion.

silver.name: Over Encumbered
silver.desc: For the next stage, you only get 1 bench slot. After, get 3 item components.

silver.name: Pandora's Bench
silver.desc: Gain 2 gold. At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

silver.name: Pandora's Items
silver.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (except Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 1 random component.

silver.name: Pumping Up I
silver.desc: Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 0.5% more.

silver.name: Recombobulator
silver.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

silver.name: Blistering Strikes
silver.desc: Your team's attacks burn their targets for 5% of their max Health over 5 seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by 33%.

silver.name: Risky Moves
silver.desc: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 30 gold.

silver.name: Silver Spoon
silver.desc: Gain 10 XP.

silver.name: Silver Veil
silver.desc: Your team gains 5% Attack Speed and is immune to the first crowd control effect in combat.

silver.name: Stationary Support I
silver.desc: After 8 player combats, gain 1 Training Dummy(s) with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

silver.name: Stimpack
silver.desc: Gain 4 components after you lose 50 player health.

silver.name: Teaming Up I
silver.desc: Gain 1 random component and 2 random Tier 3 champions.

silver.name: The Golden Remover
silver.desc:
Gain a Golden Remover and component item anvil.

Golden Remover is an Item Remover with infinite uses.

silver.name: Tiny Titans
silver.desc: Increase your current and max player health by 30.

silver.name: Tri Force I
silver.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 150 Health, 10 starting Mana, and 10% Attack Speed.

silver.name: Young and Wild and Free
silver.desc: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 2 gold.

silver.name: Beggars can be Choosers
silver.desc: You get +3 Augment rerolls for all other augment choices. Gain 7 gold.

silver.name: Called Shot
silver.desc: Set your win streak to +4. Gain 4 gold.

silver.name: Combat Bandages I
silver.desc: The first time each ally unit falls below 60% health, they restore 100-220 health (based on stage) over 2.5 seconds.

silver.name: Final Resistance
silver.desc:
Each time an allied champion dies, 30% Shred and Sunder the nearest 4 enemies for 6 seconds.

Shred: reduces Magic Resist, Sunder: reduces Armor

silver.name: Head Start
silver.desc: Gain 3 random 2-star 1 cost champions. Disable your Shop for the next 3 rounds.

silver.name: Item Collector I
silver.desc: Your team gains 10 Health. For each unique item they are holding, your team gains bonus 2 Health, 1 Attack Damage, and 1 Ability Power.

silver.name: Item Ladder
silver.desc: Gain a temporary item that unequips and transforms at the start of each round. The item quality increases each Stage.

silver.name: Mentorship I
silver.desc: If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains 12% Attack Speed and 150 Health.

silver.name: Patience Is a Virtue
silver.desc: If you did not buy a champion last round, gain 2 free rerolls.

silver.name: Placebo
silver.desc: Gain 8 gold. Your team gains 1% Attack Speed.

silver.name: Placebo+
silver.desc: Gain 15 gold. Your team gains 1% Attack Speed.

silver.name: Precise Planning
silver.desc: When you win or lose combat by 4 or fewer units, gain 2 gold next round.

silver.name: Restart Mission
silver.desc: Sell all champions on your board and bench. Gain 2 random 2-star 3-costs, 3 2-star 2-costs, and a 2-star 1-cost champion.

silver.name: Row Rejuvenation I
silver.desc: Your team has 8% Omnivamp, increased by 1% for every champion that starts combat in that same row.

silver.name: Find Your Center
silver.desc: Your champion that starts combat in the center of the board gains 15% damage and 15% max Health.

gold.name: Balanced Budget
gold.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 7 gold.

gold.name: Balanced Budget+
gold.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 10 gold.

gold.name: Caretaker's Favor
gold.desc:
Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

gold.name: Big Gains
gold.desc: Your team gains 100 bonus Health, and permanently gains 12 Health every 2 takedowns.

gold.name: Big Grab Bag
gold.desc:
Gain 3 random components, 2 gold, and 1 Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

gold.name: Capricious Forge
gold.desc:
Gain a Blacksmith's Gloves, which equips two random Artifacts each round.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

gold.name: Clear Mind
gold.desc: If there are no champions on your bench at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

gold.name: Cluttered Mind
gold.desc: Gain 4 random 1-cost champions now. If your bench is full at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

gold.name: Combat Caster
gold.desc: Your team gains 90-170 Shield for 3 seconds after casting their Ability. The Shield amount scales with round of the game.

gold.name: Ascension
gold.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 60% more damage.

gold.name: Crash Test Dummies
gold.desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies. Combat start: Your Target Dummies launch themselves towards the largest clump of enemies and Stun them for 1.25 seconds.

gold.name: Crown Guarded
gold.desc: Gain a Crownguard. Your Crownguards' start of combat effect is 100% stronger.

gold.name: Stand United II
gold.desc: Your units gain 2.5% Attack Damage and 2.5 Ability Power for each non-unique Trait active across your team.

gold.name: Dragon's Spirit
gold.desc: Gain a Dragon's Claw. Champions equipped with a Dragon's Claw gain 100 Health and 10% Durability.

gold.name: Spoils of War II
gold.desc: Enemies have a 30% chance to drop loot when killed.

gold.name: Epoch
gold.desc: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 6 XP and 2 free rerolls for that round only.

gold.name: Epoch+
gold.desc: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 8 XP and 3 free rerolls for that round only.

gold.name: Escort Quest
gold.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. You gain 3 gold every time it survives player combat.

gold.name: Unified Resistance II
gold.desc: If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

gold.name: Heroic grab bag
gold.desc:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 9 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

gold.name: Inspiring Epitaph
gold.desc: When a unit dies, the nearest ally gains a 20% max Health Shield and 10% stacking Attack Speed.

gold.name: Keepers II
gold.desc: Combat start: grant units with adjacent allies a 230 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.

gold.name: Patient Study
gold.desc: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.

gold.name: Learning To Spell
gold.desc: Your team gains 12 bonus Ability Power, and permanently gains 1 Ability Power every 2 takedowns.

gold.name: Little Buddies
gold.desc: Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain 65 Health and 7% Attack Speed for every 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your board.

gold.name: Long Distance Pals
gold.desc: Combat start: Your 2 units furthest from each other form a bond, sharing 22% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.

gold.name: Martyr
gold.desc: Whenever one of your allies die, your team heals for 9% of their max Health.

gold.name: Not Today
gold.desc: Gain an Edge of Night. Champions holding this item gain 35% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Magic Wand
gold.desc: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 18 Ability Power.

gold.name: Pandora's Items II
gold.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 2 random components.

gold.name: Portable Forge
gold.desc:
Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

gold.name: Prizefighter
gold.desc: Gain 2 item component(s). Every 5 wins gives you an item component.

gold.name: Pumping Up II
gold.desc: Your team gains 10% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 1% more.

gold.name: Raining Gold
gold.desc: Gain 8 gold now and 1 gold every round.

gold.name: Raining Gold+
gold.desc: Gain 18 gold now and 1 gold every round.

gold.name: ReinFOURcement
gold.desc: The next 4-cost champion you buy is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Get 12 gold.

gold.name: Scapegoat
gold.desc: Gain a Training Dummy and 4 gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain 1 gold.

gold.name: Scoreboard Scrapper
gold.desc: Every round, if you're in the bottom 4, your team permanently gains 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power. If you're in the top 4, they have 10% more Health.

gold.name: Slammin'
gold.desc: Gain 1 random Component(s). After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.

gold.name: Slammin'+
gold.desc: Gain 1 random component(s) and 10 XP now. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.

gold.name: Sleight of Hand
gold.desc: Gain a Thief's Gloves. Champions holding this item gain 100 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Stars are Born
gold.desc: The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 7 gold.

gold.name: Support Cache
gold.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Support items.

gold.name: Teaming Up II
gold.desc: Gain 1 random Support item and 2 random 4-cost champions.

gold.name: Three's a Crowd
gold.desc: Your team gains 75 Health for each unique 3-cost champion on your board.

gold.name: Three's Company
gold.desc: Gain 5 random 3-cost champions.

gold.name: Trade Sector
gold.desc: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 1 gold.

gold.name: Built Different II
gold.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 240-530 Health and 45-60% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

gold.name: Two Healthy
gold.desc: Your team gains 80 Health for each unique 2-cost champion on your board.

gold.name: Wandering Trainer I
gold.desc: Gain 1 gold and a Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Emblems.

gold.name: What Doesn't Kill You
gold.desc: Gain 2 gold after losing a player combat. Gain a random component after every 4 losses.

gold.name: You Have My Bow
gold.desc: Gain a Recurve Bow. Your units gain 12% Attack Speed.

gold.name: You Have My Sword
gold.desc: Gain a B.F. Sword. Your units gain 15% Attack Damage.

gold.name: Arcana Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Arcana Emblem, an Ahri, and a Hecarim.

gold.name: Bastion Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Bastion Emblem and a Nunu.

gold.name: Blaster Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Blaster Emblem.

gold.name: Chrono Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Chrono Emblem.

gold.name: Eldritch Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Eldritch emblem and a Nilah.

gold.name: Faerie Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Faerie Emblem.

gold.name: Frost Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Frost Emblem.

gold.name: Honeymancy Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Honeymancy Emblem.

gold.name: Hunter Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Hunter Emblem and a Kog'Maw.

gold.name: Incantor Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Incantor Emblem and a Syndra.

gold.name: Mage Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Mage Emblem and a Galio.

gold.name: Multistriker Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Multistriker Emblem.

gold.name: Portal Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Portal Emblem.

gold.name: Preserver Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Preserver Emblem and a Zilean.

gold.name: Pyro Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Pyro Emblem.

gold.name: Scholar Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Scholar Emblem and an Ahri.

gold.name: Shapeshifter Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Shapeshifter Emblem and a Shyvana.

gold.name: Sugarcraft Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Sugarcraft emblem and a Rumble.

gold.name: Vanguard Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Vanguard Emblem and a Rumble.

gold.name: Warrior Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Warrior Emblem and an Akali.

gold.name: Witchcraft Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Witchcraft emblem.

gold.name: All That Shimmers
gold.desc:
Open an Armory and choose a gold-generating Artifact. Gain a Magnetic Remover. Your max interest is increased to 7.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

gold.name: All That Shimmers+
gold.desc:
Open an Armory and choose a gold-generating Artifact item. Gain a Magnetic Remover and 4 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

gold.name: Avenge the Fallen
gold.desc: After 3 allies die, your team gains 28% Attack Damage, 28 Ability Power, 28 Armor, and 28 Magic Resist.

gold.name: Blossoming Lotus I
gold.desc: Your team's Abilities can critically strike. Every 3 seconds, your team gains 5% Critical Strike Chance.

gold.name: Category 5
gold.desc: Gain a Runaan's Hurricane. Your Runaan's Hurricanes shoot 1 extra bolts, each dealing 85% of the original damage.

gold.name: Clockwork Accelerator
gold.desc: Your team gains 10% Attack Speed every 3 seconds in combat.

gold.name: Combat Bandages II
gold.desc: The first time each ally unit falls below 60% health, they restore 170-350 health (based on stage) over 2.5 seconds.

gold.name: Duo Queue
gold.desc: Gain 2 random 5-cost champions and 2 copies of a random component.

gold.name: Explosive Growth
gold.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 8 XP.

gold.name: Explosive Growth+
gold.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 11 XP.

gold.name: High Voltage
gold.desc: Gain an Ionic Spark. Your Ionic Sparks have +3 hex radius and do 25% more damage.

gold.name: Item Collector II
gold.desc: Your team gains 20 Health. For each unique item they are holding, your team gains bonus 5 Health, 1.5 Attack Damage, and 1.5 Ability Power.

gold.name: Mentorship II
gold.desc: If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains 18% Attack Speed and 220 Health.

gold.name: Pilfer
gold.desc: Each round, gain a 1-star copy of the first champion you killed last combat.

gold.name: Replication
gold.desc: Choose 1 of 3 components. For the next 2 rounds, gain a copy of that component.

gold.name: Row Rejuvenation II
gold.desc: Your team has 9% Omnivamp, increased by 1.5% for every champion that starts combat in that same row.

gold.name: Spellblades
gold.desc: Whenever one of your champion casts, their next attack deals bonus magic damage equal to 120% of their Ability Power.

gold.name: Thorn-Plated Armor
gold.desc: Gain a Bramble Vest. Your Bramble Vests deal 5-100% more damage (based on Stage) and heal the holder for 50% of the damage dealt.

gold.name: Transfiguration
gold.desc: Gain a random component. For every 3 Charms you purchase this game, gain another component (max +4).

gold.name: Two Tanky
gold.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 550 Health. When one copy dies, the other gains a 40% max health Shield for 6 seconds. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

gold.name: Unleash the Beast
gold.desc: Gain a Sterak's Gage. When its effect triggers, the holder gains 35% Attack Speed for the rest of combat and immunity to crowd control for 10 seconds.

gold.name: Vertically Inclined
gold.desc:
Your team deals 9% more damage.

Deal 18% more damage instead if you have less active non-unique traits than your opponent.

gold.name: Worth the Wait
gold.desc: Gain 3 random 1-cost champion. After 1 rounds, gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

gold.name: Deja Vu
gold.desc: Gain a Galio. Your strongest Galio has +3 range and gains 15 Mana and 8 Ability Power on each attack. His Ability deals 125% more damage, but no longer stuns or reduces damage.

gold.name: Deja Vu+
gold.desc: Gain 2 Galios. Your strongest Galio gain +3 Range and gains 15 Mana and 8 Ability Power on each attack. His spell deals 125% increased damage but no longer stuns or reduces damage.

gold.name: High Horsepower
gold.desc: Gain a 2-star Lillia. Your strongest Lillia gains 125% Attack Speed and moves 75% faster. Her Ability deals 260% bonus damage, but only hits 1 target.

gold.name: Molten Caramel
gold.desc: Gain a Rumble. Your strongest Rumble's Ability deals 190% damage and costs 30 less Mana but no longer reduces damage. Rumble also gains 20% Omnivamp.

gold.name: Molten Caramel+
gold.desc: Gain 2 Rumbles. Your strongest Rumble's Ability deals 190% damage and costs 30 less Mana but no longer reduces damage. Rumble also gains 20% Omnivamp.

gold.name: Spider Queen
gold.desc: Gain a 2-star Elise. Your strongest Elise's Ability no longer Stuns, but poisons her target and the 2 closest enemies with 120% damage over 4 seconds.

gold.name: Spin To Win
gold.desc: Gain 2 Wukongs. Your strongest Wukong's Ability scales with Attack Damage instead of resists. After each cast, Wukong gains stacking 12% Attack Damage and 20% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Sweet Tooth
gold.desc: Gain a Nunu. Your strongest Nunu gains 100 Health, 200% Damage Amp per 150 Health, and his heal scales with Health. Whenever his Ability kills an enemy, Nunu permanently gains 35 Health.

gold.name: Sweet Tooth+
gold.desc: Gain 2 Nunus. Your strongest Nunu gains 100 Health and deals 200% bonus damage per 150 Health. Whenever his Ability kills an enemy, Nunu permanently gains 35 Health.

gold.name: Witchy Wallops
gold.desc: Gain a 2-star Poppy. Your strongest Poppy's Ability no longer Shields, but strikes 3 times, dealing 80% of the original damage.

gold.name: Zap Attack
gold.desc: Gain a 2-star Blitzcrank. Your strongest Blitzcrank becomes supercharged, dealing magic damage to 2 nearby enemies every 5 seconds and on every Ability cast.

gold.name: A Golden Quest
gold.desc: The first time you have 165 or more gold, gain a 2-star 5-cost champion and 3 items tailored to them.

gold.name: Fortune Favors the Bold
gold.desc: Winning combat against a player will give bonus orbs. The longer your loss streak, the bigger the payout.

gold.name: Trait Tracker
gold.desc: The first time you activate 7 non-unique traits for 1 combat, gain 6 random emblems.

gold.name: Aggressive Preservation
gold.desc: Your Preservers gain both Mana and Health restoration from the trait. Preservers deal 15% more damage. Gain a Bard and a Zilean.

gold.name: Arcane Conduit
gold.desc: Arcana champions deal 10% bonus damage. If they start combat holding 2 items, they gain a recommended 3rd completed item. Gain an Ahri and a Hecarim.

gold.name: Bee-st Friends
gold.desc: Honeymancers gain 1 more Bee. When Bees jump to a new Honeymancer, the Honeymancer gains a 10% max Health Shield. Gain a Blitzcrank and a Kog'Maw.

gold.name: Caramelized Comforts
gold.desc:
Sugarcrafters gain 60 Health and 10% chance to drop 1 gold on kill for each component they hold. Gain a Soraka and a Rumble.

Artifact, Support, and Radiant items count as 2 components.

gold.name: Cauterize
gold.desc: Pyromancers' attacks deal 5 bonus magic damage for every 3 cinder collected. Gain an Akali and a Shen.

gold.name: Draconic Mastery
gold.desc: Dragons gain 10% Health and 18% Attack Speed. After Dragons score 60 champion takedowns, gain a Smolder. Gain a Nomsy and a Shyvana.

gold.name: Hunting Frenzy
gold.desc: Your Hunters execute enemies below 10% health and gain 5% Attack Speed. Gain a Twitch and a Kog'maw.

gold.name: Eternal Growth
gold.desc: Shapeshifters that begin combat next to another Shapeshifter gain 30 permanent Health. Gain an Elise and a Jayce.

gold.name: Fast Forward
gold.desc: After casting an Ability, Chronomancers gain 40% Attack Speed and 15% Omnivamp for 3 seconds. Gain a Jax and a Zilean.

gold.name: Winter is Coming
gold.desc: The Frost trait also grants 1 placeable Frost Wolf equipped with a Protector's Vow. The wolf gains 15% Attack Speed and 100 Health per Frost tier. Gain a Warwick and a Zilean.

gold.name: Higher Education
gold.desc: Every time your Scholars spend 80 Mana, all Scholars gain 12% Attack Speed. Gain a Zoe and an Ahri.

gold.name: Potions 201
gold.desc: Witch curses last forever. Witch Abilities also curse the nearest uncursed champion. If all champions are cursed, Witches gain 20% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain a Poppy and a Cassiopeia.

gold.name: Practice Partners
gold.desc: Whenever a Mage casts an Ability, they grant 5 Mana to the nearest ally. Gain a Soraka and a Galio.

gold.name: Press the Attack
gold.desc: Your Multistriker's attacks apply a stack on their target for 5 seconds. Every 3rd stack deals true damage equal to 4% of the target's max Health. Gain a Kassadin and an Ashe.

gold.name: Raid Boss
gold.desc: Combat start: Your strongest Bastion gains 20% Health. When other unit die, they transfer 20% of their Armor and Magic Resist to it. Gain a Poppy and a Nunu.

gold.name: Royal Guard
gold.desc: Every 3 seconds, all Faeries restore 3% max Health, and the Faerie Queen gains 100% Attack Damage and Ability Power for every other suriving Faerie. Gain a Lillia and a Tristana.

gold.name: School Mascot
gold.desc: The Eldritch summon is holding beneficial items. The summon gains bonus 10% Health and 10 Ability Power. Gain an Elise and a Syndra.

gold.name: Shields Up
gold.desc: Your Vangards have 30% stronger shields. Vanguards become immune to crowd control for 6 seconds whenever they gain a shield. Gain a Rumble and a Blitzcrank.

gold.name: Double Down
gold.desc: After each player combat, gain gold equal to the length of your win or loss streak (max 4 gold).

gold.name: Eternal Growth+
gold.desc: Shapeshifters that begin combat next to another Shapeshifter gain 30 permanent Health. Shapeshifters gain 60 Health now. Gain an Elise and a Jayce.

gold.name: Pillar of Flame
gold.desc: Gain 2 Shens. Your strongest Shen's Ability no longer grants damage reduction, but now summons a large molten pillar that damages enemies in a large line.

prismatic.name: At What Cost
prismatic.desc: Immediately go to level 6. You don't get to choose your future augments.

prismatic.name: Caretaker's Chosen
prismatic.desc:
As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4: component anvil
Level 6: completed item anvil
Level 8: choose 1 of 5 Radiant items

prismatic.name: Birthday Present
prismatic.desc: Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's cost tier is your level minus 4 (min: 1-cost).

prismatic.name: Blinding Speed
prismatic.desc:
Gain a Red Buff, Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Recurve Bow and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Attack Carries!

prismatic.name: Build a Bud!
prismatic.desc: Gain a random 3-star 1-cost champion and 8 gold.

prismatic.name: Buried Treasures III
prismatic.desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 6 rounds (including this round).

prismatic.name: Final Ascension
prismatic.desc: Your team deals 20% more damage. After 15 seconds, they deal 50% more damage.

prismatic.name: Spoils of War III
prismatic.desc: Enemies have a 40% chance to drop loot when killed.

prismatic.name: Prismatic Ticket
prismatic.desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 45% chance to gain a free reroll.

prismatic.name: Going Long
prismatic.desc:
You no longer gain interest. Gain 15 gold now. Round start: gain 4 XP.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

prismatic.name: Hedge Fund
prismatic.desc:
Gain 22 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

prismatic.name: Shopping Spree
prismatic.desc: When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level, which carry over between rounds. Gain 4 gold.

prismatic.name: Impenetrable Bulwark
prismatic.desc:
Gain a Bramble Vest, a Dragon's Claw, a Giant's Belt, and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Magic Tanks or Attack Tanks!

prismatic.name: Living Forge
prismatic.desc:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 9 player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

prismatic.name: Lucky Gloves
prismatic.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

prismatic.name: Lucky Gloves+
prismatic.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 3 Sparring Gloves.

prismatic.name: Level Up!
prismatic.desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 12 immediately.

prismatic.name: New Recruit
prismatic.desc: Gain +1 max team size and a Champion Duplicator.

prismatic.name: Pandora's Items III
prismatic.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 1 random Radiant item.

prismatic.name: Phreaky Friday
prismatic.desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

prismatic.name: Phreaky Friday+
prismatic.desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

prismatic.name: Pumping Up III
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 12% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 2% more.

prismatic.name: Radiant Refactor
prismatic.desc:
Gain a Masterwork Upgrade and 1 component anvils.

Masterwork Upgrade upgrades an item to Radiant!

prismatic.name: Radiant Relics
prismatic.desc:
Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

prismatic.name: Roll The Dice
prismatic.desc:
Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

prismatic.name: March of Progress
prismatic.desc: Gain 3 XP now, and bonus XP equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

prismatic.name: The Golden Egg
prismatic.desc: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

prismatic.name: Tiniest Titan
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 player health and 2 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

prismatic.name: Tiniest Titan+
prismatic.desc:
Gain 2 player health and 2 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

Gain 15 gold now.

prismatic.name: Tiny, but Deadly
prismatic.desc: Your team is 50% smaller, but moves and attacks 30% faster.

prismatic.name: Wandering Trainer II
prismatic.desc: Gain 6 gold and a Training Dummy with 3 permanently attached Emblems.

prismatic.name: What the Forge
prismatic.desc: Completed items you own (except Tactician's Crown and Emblems) are transformed into random Artifacts. Champions gain 60 Health per equipped Artifact. Gain 1 Artifact Anvil.

prismatic.name: Call to Chaos
prismatic.desc:
Gain a powerful and random reward.
(Randomly gain one of the following:)
[58 gold], [64 experience], [40 rerolls that do not expire], [Training dummy with 2x Zeke's Herald], [Training dummy with 2x Locket of the Iron Solari], [3x Hullcrushers and an item remover], [3x Snipers focus and an item remover], [Random 3-star 3-cost unit and 20 gold], [3x Thief's Gloves and an item remover], [5 random emblems(no duplicates) and an item remover]

prismatic.name: Arcana Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain an Arcana Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, an Ahri, and a Hecarim.

prismatic.name: Bastion Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Bastion Emblem, a Steadfast Heart, and a Shen.

prismatic.name: Blaster Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Blaster Emblem, a Tear of the Goddess, and an Ezreal.

prismatic.name: Chrono Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Chrono Emblem, a Needlessly Large Rod, and a Zilean.

prismatic.name: Eldritch Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain an Eldritch Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and a Nilah.

prismatic.name: Faerie Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Faerie Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and a Tristana.

prismatic.name: Frost Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Frost Emblem, a Chain Vest, and a Zilean.

prismatic.name: Honeymancy Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Honeymancy Emblem, a Chain Vest, and a Nunu.

prismatic.name: Hunter Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Hunter Emblem, a Runaan's Hurricane, and a Kog'Maw.

prismatic.name: Incantor Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain an Incantor Emblem, a Jeweled Gauntlet, and a Syndra.

prismatic.name: Mage Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Mage Emblem, an Ionic Spark, and a Galio.

prismatic.name: Multistriker Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Multistriker Emblem, a Sparring Gloves, and a Kassadin.

prismatic.name: Portal Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Portal Emblem, a Tear of the Goddess, and a Kassadin.

prismatic.name: Preserver Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Preserver Emblem, a Nashor's Tooth, and a Bard.

prismatic.name: Pyro Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Pyro emblem, a B.F. Sword, and an Akali.

prismatic.name: Scholar Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Scholar Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Bard.

prismatic.name: Shapeshifter Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Shapeshifter Emblem, a Redemption, and a Shyvana.

prismatic.name: Sugarcraft Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Sugarcraft emblem, a Redemption, and a Rumble.

prismatic.name: Vanguard Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Vanguard Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Rumble.

prismatic.name: Warrior Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Warrior Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and an Akali.

prismatic.name: Witchcraft Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Witchcraft emblem, a Hextech Gunblade, and a Cassiopeia.

prismatic.name: Anger Issues
prismatic.desc: All your current and future completed items transform into Guinsoo's Rageblades that grant 35 Armor and Magic Resist. Every 2 Rageblade stacks grant 1% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

prismatic.name: Blossoming Lotus II
prismatic.desc: Your team's Abilities can critically strike. Every 3 seconds, your team gains 15% Critical Strike Chance.

prismatic.name: Dark Alley Dealings
prismatic.desc: Gain a Suspicious Trenchcoat. After 3 player combats, gain a Trickster's Glass.

prismatic.name: Dual Purpose
prismatic.desc: The first time you buy XP each round, gain 2 gold. Whenever you buy XP, reroll your Shop.

prismatic.name: Flexible
prismatic.desc: Gain 1 random emblem. At the start of every Stage, gain a random emblem. Your team gains 30 Health for each emblem they are holding.

prismatic.name: Giant and Mighty
prismatic.desc: Your team gets larger, gaining 300 Health and +4% max Health.

prismatic.name: Hard Commit
prismatic.desc: Gain a random emblem. Now and at the start of each stage, gain a 1-star champion of that trait with a cost equal to the Stage (max 5).

prismatic.name: I'm the Carry now
prismatic.desc: Get a Sentinel with tailored offensive items. It gets stronger at the start of each Stage.

prismatic.name: Immovable Object
prismatic.desc: Gain a Randuin's Omen. Its range is increased by 1 hex and its effect is increased by 60%.

prismatic.name: Invested+
prismatic.desc: Gain 26 gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

prismatic.name: Invested++
prismatic.desc: Gain 45 gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

prismatic.name: Shimmerscale Essence
prismatic.desc:
Gain a Mogul's Mail. In 5 rounds, gain a Gamblers Blade.

These items give gold as well as combat power.

prismatic.name: Spellcaster's Toolbox
prismatic.desc: Gain a Manazane. In 3 rounds, gain a Zhonya's Paradox.

prismatic.name: Subscription Service
prismatic.desc: Now, and at the start of each Stage, open a Shop of 4 unique 4-cost champions and gain 6 gold.

prismatic.name: Upward Mobility
prismatic.desc: Buying XP costs 1 less. Gain 2 Health and 2 free rerolls whenever you level up.

prismatic.name: Worth the Wait II
prismatic.desc: Gain a random 2-cost champion. Gain another copy at the start of each round for the next rest of the game.

prismatic.name: An Upgraded Adventure
prismatic.desc: After upgrading 4 champions to 3-star, gain a magnificent reward. Gain 2 1-cost champions.

prismatic.name: Marksman's Toolbox
prismatic.desc: Gain a Sniper's Focus. In 3 rounds, gain a Fishbones.
